name: Bailout Casino
description:
The Odds Will Betray You.

Bailout Casino is a platformer where you will have to use your precise jumping skills in stages that are out to eliminate you before you even had a chance to land. Each time you land, you will have to bet where the betting line will be. Will it be over or under you?

The game's enviroment will have tells that will let you know where the line will be before you land. It is up to the player to find these hints out while leaping from platform to platform.

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Space Bar - Jump

Q/X - Change Your Bet





**HINTS**:


You have to be over or under the betting line to see if you are going to make it safely on a platform. Pay attention to the line before you jump to make your bet!
